original_text: Ahithophel was succeeded by Jehoiada the son of Benaiah, and Abiathar. Joab was commander of the king's army.
korean_text: 브나야의 아들 여호야다와 아비아달은 아히도벨의 뒤를 이었고 요압은 왕의 군대 지휘관이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: Ahithophel was succeeded by Jehoiada the son of Benaiah,
sentences.korean_translation: 아히도펠의 뒤를 이어 베나야의 아들 여호야다가 섰고,

sentences.original_text: Joab was commander of the king's army.
